column4: What do you do when an INSTALL file tells you to ./configure and then make, but make just returns "make: *** No targets specified and no makefile found.  Stop."?

2007-09-06T08:26:00.000Z	Svish		daffa: it does? But I just installed build-essential
2007-09-06T08:26:00.000Z	stdin	Svish	looks like you need to run automake/autoconf
